TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MessageSecurityOverMsmq extends System.Object

summary.span: 可用来设置 绑定上的消息级安全属性。

span.span: Enables setting message-level security properties on the binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过 属性（它返回 对象）从绑定访问此对象。This object is accessed from the binding by means of the property, which returns a object. 此对象具有 的属性，该属性提供对 对象的引用。This object has a property that provides a reference to the object. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UEMessageSecurityOverMsmq#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemessagesecurityovermsmq/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[UEMessageSecurityOverMsmq#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemessagesecurityovermsmq/vb/program.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Security::SecurityAlgorithmSuite ^ AlgorithmSuite { System::ServiceModel::Security::SecurityAlgorithmSuite ^ get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Security::SecurityAlgorithmSuite ^ value); };

summary.span: 指定用于 SOAP 级安全消息的算法套件。

span.span: Specifies the algorithm suite used for security messages at the SOAP level.

value.span: 通过 绑定发送的消息的 设置。

span.span: The setting for messages sent over the binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义了各种算法，如规范化、摘要式、密钥换行、签名、加密和密钥派生算法。 defines of a variety of algorithms such as Canonicalization, Digest, KeyWrap, Signature, Encryption, and KeyDerivation algorithms. 如果工作平台使用了一组与默认设置不同的算法，则此属性最为有用。This property is most relevant when working with a platform that uses a set of algorithms different than the default. 在对此属性进行修改时，应注意相关算法的优缺点。You should be aware of the strengths and weaknesses of the relevant algorithms when making modifications to this property. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UEMessageSecurityOverMsmq#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemessagesecurityovermsmq/cs/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[UEMessageSecurityOverMsmq#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemessagesecurityovermsmq/vb/program.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::MessageCredentialType ClientCredentialType { System::ServiceModel::MessageCredentialType get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::MessageCredentialType value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置通过 MSMQ 传输发送的消息的 安全设置。

span.span: Gets or sets the security setting for messages sent over the MSMQ transport.

value.span: 通过 MSMQ 传输发送的消息的 安全设置。

span.span: The security setting for messages sent over the MSMQ transport.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以设置为下列值之一：This property can be set to one of the following values: - **无**： 这允许服务与匿名客户端交互。**None**: This allows the service to interact with anonymous clients. 服务和客户端都不需要凭据。Neither the service nor the client requires a credential. - **Windows**： 这允许 SOAP 交换在已通过身份验证的 Windows 凭据上下文。**Windows**: This allows the SOAP exchanges to be under the authenticated context of a Windows credential. 此设置总是执行基于 Kerberos 的身份验证。This always performs Kerberos-based authentication. - **用户名**： 这允许服务要求客户端进行身份验证使用 UserName 凭据。**UserName**: This allows the service to require that the client be authenticated using a UserName credential. 此凭据必须使用 类来指定。This credential must be specified using class. > [!NOTE] > WCF 不支持发送密码摘要，也派生密钥使用的密码，并使用这样的密钥来提供消息安全性。WCF does not support sending a password digest or deriving keys using password and using such keys for message security. 在这种情况下，WCF 将交换的安全性时使用 UserName 凭据。As such, WCF enforces that the exchange is secured when using UserName credentials. 此模式要求使用客户端上，指定服务证书`ClientCredential`行为和`serviceCertificate`:This mode requires that the service certificate be specified on the client using `ClientCredential` behavior and `serviceCertificate`: - `Certificate`：此值允许服务要求使用证书对客户端进行身份验证。`Certificate`: This allows the service to require that the client be authenticated using a certificate. 在此情况下，必须使用 类或 `ClientCredentials` 行为指定客户端。The client credential in this case must be specified using class or `ClientCredentials` behavior. 在此情况下，必须使用 类或 `ClientCredentials` 行为，通过指定 `serviceCertificate` 来指定服务凭据。The service credential in this case must be specified using class or `ClientCredentials` behavior by specifying the `serviceCertificate`. - `InfoCard`：此值允许服务要求使用 InfoCard 对客户端进行身份验证。`InfoCard`: This allows the service to require that the client be authenticated using an InfoCard. 必须在 `serviceCertificate` 行为中设置 `ClientCredential`。The `serviceCertificate` must be provisioned in the `ClientCredential` behavior. - 只有在将安全模式设置为 `MessageSecurityOverMsmq` 或 `Both` 时，`Message` 的 Certificate 凭据才是有意义的。The Certificate credential for the `MessageSecurityOverMsmq` is relevant only when the security mode is set to `Both` or `Message`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UEMessageSecurityOverMsmq#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemessagesecurityovermsmq/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[UEMessageSecurityOverMsmq#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/uemessagesecurityovermsmq/vb/program.vb#3)]
